sqlMap.select: select org.descr as org_descr, org.org_unit_id, type.name as org_type_name, type.key as org_type_key, type.descr as org_type_descr, name.name as org_name, name.language_code, name.category from tbl_org_unit as org inner join tbl_org_type_reg as type on org.org_type_id = type.org_type_id left outer join tbl_org_unit_name as name on org.org_unit_id = name.org_unit_id order by org_unit_id desc

select org.descr as org_descr, org.org_unit_id, type.name as org_type_name, type.key as org_type_key, type.descr as org_type_descr, name.name as org_name, name.language_code, name.category from tbl_org_unit as org inner join tbl_org_type_reg as type on org.org_type_id = type.org_type_id left outer join tbl_org_unit_name as name on org.org_unit_id = name.org_unit_id where org.org_unit_id in (select org_unit_id from tbl_ip_address where ip_address_from <= #address# and ip_address_to >= #address#) order by org_unit_id desc
